skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: I have experience in building responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.I have also worked with Bootstrap, Materialize, and Tailwind CSS to create visually appealing websites.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: I have experience in building RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. I have also worked with MongoDB,MySQL,Firebase to create and manage databases.Test API using Postman.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have experience in creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes using Figma and Adobe XD. I have also worked with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to create custom graphics for websites.
